titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2667) making emergency supplemental appropriations for relief from the major, widespread flooding in the Midwest for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-187, by Mr. Wheat.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2667 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against the bill are waived. The modification to the bill printed in part 1 of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. All points of order against the bill, as modified, are waived. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order. No amendment to the bill, as modified, shall be in order except the amendment printed in part 2 of the report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 70.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 245 - 178 (Roll no. 354).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 216 (Roll no. 355).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2667 (emergency supplemental appropriations for relief from the flooding in the Midwest).
